channel.title: What's going on?
channel.description: So what's going on with the rank, I see that it was removed (the title, and color [could care less about the color and title but my point is...]) is the MSCP rank soon being removed because of confusion or what?

item.title: What's going on?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

July 22, 2013, 05:09:50 pm

This is the last reply someone has made on this thread/board. So what is up with things going on with this board now? I’m more than curious now. I haven’t really thought about it until now to be honest.

Tom:

The rank isn’t being removed, and there was no colour. The rank is just hidden and for discussion purposes until it can be completed completely on a technical side, and I would like to discuss a few things with the staff about it.

So want to post an update?

Read full topic

item.title: What's going on?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:


.

Read full topic

item.title: What's going on?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

By all means, I could care less for both the color and title but was wondering as I understood there was indeed a lot of “fowl play” about the rank when it was created and before it was. I was thinking it was getting ready to be removed until as Amy said, “I saw the board”.

Thanks for letting us know Tom.

Read full topic

item.title: What's going on?
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I only noticed this the other day, but i saw no point to mentioning it. I thought i was just being a bad community member, but then i saw i still had access to this board and got a little confused.

Read full topic

I’m pretty sure the Admins realize that this was a useless title without clear guidelines about who would get it.
